Description:
All Users having Copilot SKU (Viva Learning Seeded and Premium) will be nudged about Copilot Academy through a notification on Teams. Users will also get a monthly recurring notification in Teams about Copilot Academy.
GA date: October CY2024
Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy Nudges to all Copilot SKU users (Seeded and Premium Viva Learning Users)
